## delay variable

HOF delay line generator. Returned function takes single boolean arg, buffers `n` values (ring buffer) and returns currently oldest. The first `n` results will always be `false`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
delay: (n: number) => (x: boolean) => boolean
```
